main event: A civilian reported observing a brightly glowing object in York, Pennsylvania, on 15 October 1956, for about five seconds.
interesting points: The object was seen visually with no physical evidence or photographs available., The observation lasted approximately five seconds., The object had no discernible sound or motion during the brief sighting., The conclusion suggested a probable explanation but offered no specific detail., The report also included a separate questionnaire from 1966 regarding another UFO sighting in the same area.
